description: Process status published by Go prometheus client library, e.g. memory used, fds open, GC details

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(irate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster=~"^($cluster)$", namespace=~"^($namespace)$", pod=~"^($pod)$"}[1m])) by (le, cluster, namespace, pod))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(irate(http_server_response_size_bytes_bucket{cluster=~"^($cluster)$", namespace=~"^($namespace)$", pod=~"^($pod)$"}[1m])) by (le, cluster, namespace, pod))
sum(irate(grpc_server_started_total{cluster=~"^($cluster)$", namespace=~"^($namespace)$", pod=~"^($pod)$"}[$interval])) by (cluster, namespace, grpc_method, pod)

title: microservices
